Eric Werner

Hi, I'm Eric. I graduated with my Masters in CS from Stanford, with a concentration in AI. Previously, I got my Undergraduate in Engineering Physics with a focus on electromechanical systems design. I currently build computer vision models at MetronMind for automated veterinary reports.
